# What

Dispatch task on nodes with make

# Test on a handful test VM

```console
thy@tdews2:~$ time fibs.mk
mkdir tmp/fib
1 1 2 1 3 2 4 3 5 5 6 8 7 13 8 21 9 34 10 55 11 89 12 144 13 233 14 377 15 610 16 987 17 1597 18 2584 19 4181 20 6765 21 10946 22 17711 23 28657 24 46368 25 75025 26 121393 27 196418 28 317811 29 514229 30 832040 31 1346269 32 2178309 33 3524578 
real	0m30.189s
user	0m3.422s
sys	0m2.105s
thy@tdews2:~$ fibs.mk clean
rm -r tmp/fib
thy@tdews2:~$ time fibs.mk -j 4
mkdir tmp/fib
1 2 3 4 1 2 5 1 6 7 3 8 13 9 21 10 8 5 11 12 89 13 144 14 34 15 55 16 233 17 610 18 987 19 377 20 2584 21 1597 4181 22 23 6765 24 10946 25 46368 26 17711 28657 27 28 75025 29 121393 30 196418 31 317811 32 832040 33 514229 1346269 2178309 3524578 
real	0m10.258s
user	0m2.810s
sys	0m1.450s
thy@tdews2:~$ fibs.mk clean
rm -r tmp/fib
thy@tdews2:~$ time fibs.mk -j 8
14 16 17 18 19 20 21 22 2584 987 23 24 377 25 10946 1597 4181 17711 26 27 28 29 6765 30 46368 31 121393 28657 75025 32 33 514229 196418 317811 832040 1346269 2178309 3524578 
real	0m5.959s
user	0m1.410s
sys	0m0.858s
```
